title: What should a student do after 12th? - Quora

response.answer_text: Every student must not be tensed about his results.He/she must have responsibility to shape his/her career.students must know what are the different options available for higher education and choose according to passion in which one wants to succeed.There are various online sources to know different options in this modern era,and i think such sources must be efficiently used for ur growth and success. All the best for ur life ahead
